original_text: And you magnified yourselves against me with your mouth, and multiplied your words against me; I heard it.
korean_text: 너희가 나를 대적하여 입으로 자랑하며 나를 대적하여 여러 가지로 말한 것을 내가 들었노라

sentences.original_text: And you magnified yourselves against me with your mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 입으로 나를 거스려 스스로를 높였고

sentences.original_text: and multiplied your words against me
